'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is an [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire abilities|ability]] in {{poe2}}.

==Description==
{{Description|{{#var:description}}}}

==Effects==
{{#var:effects_formatted}}

==Notes==
* Despite the description, Ascendant's Soul Whip does not provide "more" bonus damage while at max Focus. This effect is provided by the [[Ascended]] passive instead. The damage bonus is retained while at max Focus, as opposed to the regular Soul Whip where it is removed.
title: Soul Whip (Ascendant)
